creditline: Gift of Marsha Thompson with the cooperation of David Dyregrov for whom this drawing was made
description: man on horseback wearing a fur hat and a long cloak (black on inside; black and white checked on outside), holding a child in his arms; gnarled trees at left and right; hair-like lines above figures, with two faces of maidens, face with pointed ears wearing a tall crown and pair of hands with long fingers, and elf with pointed ears and tall cap at top center
medium: Pen and brush and ink on board
title: Der Erlkoenig (The Elf King)
